2017.title: Clarity 2.0
2017.description: Clarity is a Graphic User Interface (GUI) software package that allows a user with little or no machine vision software experience to develop a machine vision application for use on JADAK’s smart cameras.

2017.title: BERTWave™ MP2110A
2017.description: The BERTWave MP2110A is an all-in-one instrument with built-in 4 channel Sampling Oscilloscope and BERT designed for manufacturing inspection of 10G to 1.6T optical modules.

2017.title: LuphoScan 260 HD
2017.description: The LUPHOScan HD non-contact 3D optical profilometer/equipment delivers the highest accuracy for radius and irregularity on challenging surfaces such as high departure aspheres and freeforms.

2017.title: Olympus Europa LEXT OLS5000
2017.description: The Olympus LEXT OLS5000 3D Measuring Laser Microscope precisely measures shape and surface roughness at the submicron level.

2017.title: DPO7OE1
2017.description: The DPO7OE Series Optical probes can be used as Optical Reference Receivers (ORR) for high speed serial data signals (using selectable Bessel-Thomson ORR filters), or can be used as a conventional O/E converter for general wide-bandwidth optical signal acquisition.
